creator: Crispin.Boylan@logicacmg.com
text:
In latest nightly builds, 24/2, 25/2 (not sure about before then) it has become
impossible to Disable items which are enabled, and vice versa.  The option in
the menu is there, but when you click away from the item after disabling or
enabling it it just reverts back to its previous state.

Same here. I've checked in a fix that seems to work, but it may need 
revisiting...
creator: sebb@apache.org
